api_list.name: get image with id or result

after imagination, wait little seconds,  use the id to get the image url
after change pic, wait little seconds, use the result id to get the exact image url.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-chatgpt-midjourney.p.rapidapi.com/task/7373632308585598/fetch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-chatgpt-midjourney.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-chatgpt-midjourney.p.rapidapi.com/task/{id}/fetch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-chatgpt-midjourney.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
